name: Andrzej Ito
profile_summary: As a Senior Operations Engineer, I bring over 9 years of experience in managing and optimizing sales processes and account management strategies. Proficient in **Salesforce**, **SAP**, and CRM systems, I excel in forecasting, analytics, and stakeholder management. My strong background in Lean and Six Sigma methodologies allows me to streamline operations and enhance performance. I have a proven track record of collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure governance and deliver impactful solutions that improve organizational efficiency while maintaining a user-centric approach.
